name: Michele Guest House

reviews.text: We visited Pisa to celebrate my girlfried's birthday in mid of November. We have several options to stay in Pisa, but chose Michelle's house because of the positive reviews on the website. We stayed on "Cinque Terre" room and must say that it surpassed all our requirements. It was clean and spacy, with perfect insuite bathroom with beautiful wall-engraved pictures. Michele is a perfect host and photographer. I bet you have not met such a person before. He did his best to make our stay remarkable. First I needed internet access and Michelle give it to me FREE. Even proposed to me a notebook, absolutely free of charge. I can't miss that we had a Nespresso coffee machine in the room and moreover the coffee was absolutly FREE. From the first day in the house he gave us a detailed day-by-day plan where to go during our 8 day stay in Pisa. We haven't even bought a map of the region - Michele give it to us FREE filled with notes and recommendations. I am not sure if you will believe me, but on the birthay of my girlfriend he even bought her a present.
reviews.title: Best service and amazing host Michelle!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved Pisa, thanks to Micheles' recommendations of places to see and eat. Pisa was great to stroll around after the hectic tourist spot of Rome.
reviews.title: Awesome place to stay... don't bother looking anywhere else - stay here

likes.liked: — Micheles' advice on things to do in Pisa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B&B was perfectly decorated, clean and secure. We loved the local coffee shop just down the street for our morning coffee.
reviews.title: Great stay in Pisa
Perfect for Pisa
reviews.text: Thank you Michele for your hospitality.

reviews.title: a quiet place to stay
reviews.text: We stayed in Pisa for only a couple of days but Michele made the whole experience a great succes. He gave us some invaluable information which we were very greatful and which made our trip to Italy a throughly amazing experience. Gracie Michele

We spent a week at this hotel and loved every minute. It is ideally situated for those wishing to travel around the area by train, being minutes away from the station, and easy walking distance from the centre of Pisa. You can be in Florence in about an hour, Siena the same , Lucca half an hour. We walked to the hotel from the airport, about 20 minutes. Having said this, it is very quiet and peaceful. The place is immaculately clean and the plumbing is excellent!Michele is a wonderful host, extremely knowledgible,discrete and most helpful. His tips about eating places in Pisa are A1. It is a vibrant town with a lovely atmosphere and worth visiting for more than just a quick look.Try it!
reviews.title: Fabulous place to stay!

likes.liked: — Host, Michele was very interesting and told me lots about the local area and was very helpful.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This guesthouse served our purpose for somewhere to stay for 1 night on our way to Cinque Terre but I wldn't recommend it for any longer. The room was clean enough and bathroom was fine, but it was pretty basic with 70's like furniture. There was also no breakfast included and neighbouring dogs barked and woke us up in the morning.
reviews.title: ok for 1 night
Please think twice
reviews.text: Pros: cheap(ish) and near the train station we needed.

reviews.title: very good
reviews.text: I dont know how to start this review actually as i'm quite confused. I think the reviews which have been left which are postive do not travel very often. We stayed in the cinque terre room, with a private showeroom. The room next to us had no bathroom so passed our room to use the toilet etc, everynight without fail we kept getting guests trying to practically break into our room, it was very strange we couldnt work out what was going on but apparently the rooms were hard to find so we let it go. Michelle takes up a lot of your time unnecessarily, not one of his recommendations proved succesful, we did not appreciate after a long flight and suitcases at our feet getting historical facts and figures about Pisa which were not relevant. He was extremely rude when he discovered we did not follow his specific itinery he had in mind for us and kept repeating "you should have listened to me, you should have listened to me" I didnt realise we were on a holiday with and for Michelle!!! It is very central right next to the train station but its in a disgusting street, not good if your on a girls holiday as their are a lot of unpleasant people in that area. We definately would not go back as their was nothing which stood out to us as reasonable or acceptable it was all very basic.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.text: stayed 3 nights in april,rooms very clean and comfortable,good value,excellant location for price.michele is very helpful.If he advises somewhere to visit or eat take his advice.He sent us to 2 restauraunts and both were excellant and no more expensive than the ordinary places we seen.Location is very good,1minute from station.15 mins from tower.

I'm not sure which room the previous reviewer stayed in, but have to say that we stayed in the Cinque Terre room which was absolutely lovely. The bedding and towels were very fresh and clean, the room was lovely and had an amazing selection of wines and a laptop with internet connection. Yes, the street itself is rather drab, but once you've gone up to the right floor - the place itself is fine (with some of Michele's wonderful photographs on the walls). The location is ideal for the railway station and pretty close to the airport too.
reviews.title: Don't book the cheap rooms!

description: In the heart of Pisa, in a peaceful environment, only 150 metres from the Central Station and only 2 kilometres from Pisa’s International Airport Pisa “Galileo Galilei”, is situated “Michele Guest House”The B&B have beautiful suites, spacious rooms and charming apartments comfortably furnished . Two family rooms so comfortable for longue stay! Each air-conditioned accommodation boasts a flat screen satellite television, dvd player, hifi stereo equipment, mini bar, safety deposit box and internet access. The breakfast is continental-english with so many choice. You can freely leave your luggage at the B&B after the check-out and pick it up just before leaving the city.
